objects.name: Floor
objects.texture: assets\Bottom Left Corner Wood Background Cutout.png

events.comment: Note: the ambient light is darkened than normal to give the game some effect.
CenterX() and CenterY() is used so that light object is at the center of the player and not at the corner
Object group Colliders inclue all the objects the player should collide with/shouldn't pass though. Ex: Walls, Stone, etc..
A skull is created where the player died. And the player's position is reset
The spike turns to the angle of the Turn object. This way there is more flexibility on which direction the spike moves
The ambient light is set to 255;255;255 (white), meaning that the there will not be any darkness. The PlayerLight is deleted as it is not needed anymore.
